name: Gold embroidered black gloves
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance a bit.
While worn, these gloves will reduce the drain of all spells by a small amount.
